thread.title: Franz Wagner returns to play against Trail Blazers, the Magic announce
thread.title_full: Franz Wagner returns to play against Trail Blazers, the Magic announce

author: Mike Gramajo
title: Franz Wagner returns to play against Trail Blazers, the Magic announce
text:
Franz Wagner returns from injury to play for Magic against Trail Blazers
Advertisement
Franz Wagner returns from injury to play for Magic against Trail Blazers
Orlando Magic small forward Franz Wagner is back from injury. Ahead of their Thursday night game against the Portland Trail Blazers at the Kia Center, the Magic announced Wagner will play after missing 20 games after suffering torn oblique injury on Dec. 6 against the Philadelphia 76ers. Orlando (23-22) will look to snap a four-game losing streak that's catapulted the Magic from fourth place in the Eastern Conference standing to eighth. The Magic are currently 7-13 without Wagner. Wagner has been averaging 24.4 points, 5.7 assists and 5.6 rebounds during the first 25 games before the injury. The game is slated to tipoff at 7 p.m.
